reprodA.date: Mon May 05 2025 21:44:23 GMT+0200 (heure d’été d’Europe centrale)

questions.primary_text: Please answer the following demographic questions
questions.secondary_text: What is your gender ?
What is your age ?

views.title: Training task (1/2)
views.body_text: During this experiment, you will have to solve mazes with the help of an AI. You will first perform a training phase so that you get comfortable with the interface and the problem. As a first training task, you will have to solve a series of mazes by yourself, without any AI assistance. Throughout the training series, you will get a feedback each time you answer, so that you know if you took the right decision or not. Are you ready to do the first training series ?

question.secondary_text: Which exit can you get to from the start ?

views.title: Training task (2/2)
views.body_text: Now that you are more comfortable with the task, we will introduce the AI which will assist you for solving the mazes. It will suggest an exit. It is still you responsibility to take the decision you submit.

question.secondary_text: Which exit can you get to from the start ?

views.title: Start of the experiment
views.body_text: The training phase is over. You will now start the actual experiment. The task is the same as the last training task. However, you will not get a feedback indicating if made the right decisions anymore.

question.secondary_text: Which exit can you get to from the start ?

views.title: Survey
views.body_text: The task is now over, you are now about to reach the last part of the protocol, which is a survey. There will be three pages of questions. Please answer all of them and press Terminate to terminate the experiment.

questions.primary_text: Please complete the following survey about the AI that assisted you.
questions.secondary_text: I believe the AI is a competent performer.
I trust the AI.
I have confidence in the advice given by the AI.
I can depend on the AI.
I can rely on the AI to behave in consistent ways.
I can rely on the AI to do its best every time I take its advice.
I trust the AI.

questions.primary_text: Please complete the following survey about the task you had to perform.
questions.secondary_text: I found this task interesting.
I found this task difficult without the AI.
I found this task difficult even with the AI.
I would prefer to complete this task with the AI’s suggestions than to complete it by myself.
Please select the option below which best represents how you used the AI.
answers: I did not use the AI and completed the task by myself.
I first completed the task myself and then verified my response with the AI’s.
I first looked at the AI’s suggestion and then verified it was correct.
I always chose the AI’s suggestion.

questions.secondary_text: Approximately, how accurate do you think the AI is? Please indicate using the slider below (from 0% to 100%).
In the box below, please describe how you used the AI when its suggestions were given to you.
In the box below, please describe how you chose between using the AI and doing the task yourself.

questions.primary_text: Please complete the following survey about your personal preferences.
questions.secondary_text: I would prefer complex to simple problems.
I like to have the responsibility of handling a situation that requires a lot of thinking.
Thinking is not my idea of fun.
I would rather do something that requires little thought than something that is sure to challenge my thinking abilities.
I really enjoy a task that involves coming up with new solutions to problems.
I would prefer a task that is intellectual, difficult, and important to one that is somewhat important but does not require much thought.
I found this task difficult even with the AI.
I would prefer to complete this task with the AI’s suggestions than to complete it by myself.

views.title: The experiment is over
views.body_text: Thank you for you participation to the experiment. Please click on Terminate.
You may now close this page.
